thread.section_title: Distrikt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel
thread.title_full: Great Hotel - Review of Distrikt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Branden L
title: Great Hotel
text: Stayed here for 2 nights earlier this month. If you're a tourist who wants to spend their time in Time Square, you can't get much better than this. The hotel itself is very clean and nice. The room I stayed in was spacious and clean. Customer service was great as well, Faye was very helpful during my stay. Definitely recommend.
